entities.name: room of requirement

entities.name: corridor upstairs

entities.name: castle

relationships.description: Ron and Hermione are mentioned as setting about gathering fangs together, indicating that they are accompanying each other.
Ron is mentioned as gathering up fangs with Hermione, indicating a relationship between Ron and the fangs.
Hermione is also mentioned as gathering up fangs with Ron, indicating a relationship between Hermione and the fangs.
Ron is mentioned as spending some minutes in the Room of Requirement, indicating that he has visited this room.
Hermione is also mentioned as spending some minutes in the Room of Requirement, indicating that she has visited this room.
Ron is mentioned as stepping back into the corridor upstairs after leaving the Room of Requirement, indicating that he has entered this corridor.
Hermione is also mentioned as stepping back into the corridor upstairs after leaving the Room of Requirement, indicating that she has entered this corridor.
Ron is mentioned as being located in the castle, which is implied to be deteriorating.
Hermione is also mentioned as being located in the castle, which is implied to be deteriorating.
